_header: Alas mourning I sing mourning I call
Subjects: mystery plays, English songs in; songs
_description: Fragment of an English song [‘cantant’] in the Cornish mystery play of the Three Marys in the Ordinale de Resurrexione Domini Nostri Jhesu Christi

Bod791.Transcription:
ellas mornyngh y syngh mornyng y calour lord ys deyd that bogthe ovs
                    al
Bod791.Note:
‘Cantant’ in left margin against text; 1695 English
                    trans. in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Corn e.2 (SC 28556), p. 278; 1695 Cornish transcript in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Corn. e.3 (SC 28557), p. 427

             The Legend of the Rood…from the Cornish Miracle Plays.

Robbins,  Rossell Hope.
